integrations_researched.name: Vercel AI SDK

api_patterns.initialization: Requires a model provider like @ai-sdk/openai, @ai-sdk/anthropic, etc.
key_functions: useChat() - React hook for chat state management

gotchas: Next.js versions 13.4-15 require experimental.instrumentationHook in next.config.js for observability
Provider packages (@ai-sdk/openai, etc.) must be installed separately
AI SDK v5 is latest - ensure provider packages are v2 compatible

integrations_researched.name: AI Elements

verified_package.name: ai-elements
verified_package.install_command: npx ai-elements@latest (CLI installer, not npm package)

api_patterns.initialization: Installed via CLI, requires shadcn/ui as prerequisite

gotchas: Not a traditional npm package - uses CLI installer: npx ai-elements@latest
Requires shadcn/ui to be initialized first: npx shadcn@latest init
Can install specific components: npx ai-elements@latest add message
Available components: conversation, message, code-block, prompt-input

recommendations: Use Vercel AI SDK (ai package) with @ai-sdk/react for state management
Use AI Elements for pre-built UI components - they integrate with @ai-sdk/react useChat hook
AI Elements requires shadcn/ui as foundation - set this up first
Both libraries are from Vercel and work well together
For the gateway dashboard redesign: use AI Elements Conversation component for chat interfaces, with custom components for non-chat management UI
